column1: RAW STEEL:  WORLD PRODUCTION, BY COUNTRY1, 2, 3
See footnotes at end of table.
RAW STEEL:  WORLD PRODUCTION, BY COUNTRY1, 2, 3
1World totals, U.S. data, and estimated data are rounded to no more than three significant digits
2Steel formed in solid state after melting, suitable for further processing or sale
material reported as "liquid steel, "presumably measured in the molten state prior to cooling in any specific form.
4In addition to the countries listed, Mozambique is known to have steelmaking plants, but available information is
inadequate to make reliable estimates of output levels.
5Data for year ending June 30 of that stated.
8Figures reported by the State Statistical Bureau that Chinese Government considers as official statistical data.
